alerts.headline: severe thunderstorm watch ended
alerts.description:
Conditions are no longer favourable for the development of severe thunderstorms.


###

alerts.headline: severe thunderstorm watch ended
alerts.description:
Conditions are no longer favourable for the development of severe thunderstorms.


###

alerts.headline: frost advisory in effect
alerts.description:
Temperatures are expected to drop to near the freezing mark Sunday morning, and again Sunday evening into Monday morning.

###

Frost advisories are issued when temperatures are expected to reach the freezing mark during the growing season, leading to potential damage and destruction to plants and crops.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
alerts.instruction: Cover up plants, especially those in frost-prone areas.

alerts.headline: frost advisory in effect
alerts.description:
Temperatures are expected to drop to below the freezing mark overnight tonight into Monday morning. Similar freezing conditions are also expected overnight Monday into Tuesday morning.

###

Frost advisories are issued when temperatures are expected to reach the freezing mark during the growing season, leading to potential damage and destruction to plants and crops.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
alerts.instruction: Cover up plants, especially those in frost-prone areas.
